abstract: Precision Castparts agreed late on Friday to buy the Titanium Metals Corporation, an industrial parts maker whose majority owner is the Texas billionaire Harold Simmons, for about $2.9 billion.
snippet: Precision Castparts agreed late on Friday to buy the Titanium Metals Corporation, an industrial parts maker whose majority owner is the Texas billionaire Harold Simmons, for about $2.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: The Precision Castparts Corporation agreed on Friday to buy the Titanium Metals Corporation, an industrial parts maker whose majority owner is the Texas billionaire Harold Simmons, for about $2.9 billion in cash.

headline.main: Precision Castparts to Buy Titanium Metals for $2.9 Billion

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
